headline: A magician I am not. Warnock tests a different tone
author: Greg Bluestein
sentences: MSNBC host Chuck Todd called the spot the best of the letting the base down gently ads this election cycle from Democrats under pressure to meet unfulfilled promises to expand voting rights, combat climate change, eliminate student debt and other overhauls.

Warnock might be the most vulnerable Democratic Senate incumbent up for a vote in 2022, and he must grapple with unease over rising inflation along with frustration from some liberals upset at the pace of Bidens agenda.

And hes split with President Joe Biden on his plan to close a military training center in Savannah and his plan to rescind an executive order that gives officials the authority to turn away migrants at the U.S. border.

Of course not  Warnocks latest campaign ad nods to challenges facing Democrats in Georgia #gapol #gasen pic.twitter.com/ZM0EhlGNpX
 Greg Bluestein (@bluestein) April 20, 2022
Is it part of a recalibration?
Facing a tough reelection battle, Warnock has emphasized policies such as capping the price of insulin and suspending the federal gas tax over more polarizing measures.
Mallory Blount, an aide to GOP Senate frontrunner Herschel Walker, said if this is your messaging strategy, youre already losing.
And Stephen Lawson, a strategist for a pro-Walker outside group, said the new ad amounted to an early concession speech.
His latest 30-second TV spot ditches the tempestuous language in favor of a more realistic approach.
U.S. Sen. Raphael Warnock campaigned for office in 2020 promising a storm of change if he won.
This is the equivalent of throwing a Hail Mary in the first quarter of a football game.
I approve his message because thats not magic, thats doing the job for Georgia.
So in just a year in the Senate did I think I could fix Washington?
So in just a year in the Senate did I think I could fix Washington?
But every day I focused on what I could do for our state.
Republicans saw it in a much harsher light.
Of course not, Warnock said in the ad.
Fixing infrastructure.
But a magician Im not.
But a magician Im not.
Expanding healthcare.
Im Raphael Warnock.
Im Raphael Warnock.
Creating jobs.
A senator.
A senator.
A pastor.
A pastor.
Im a dad.
Im a dad.
